devdoc.author: @neuro_0x
devdoc.details: A contract for distributing ERC20 tokens to a list of recipients.

AirdropFailed(address,address,address,ui.details: Emitted when an failed airdrop occurs.

params.contents: A list of recipients and amounts for the airdrop.
params.tokenAddress: The address of the token to be airdropped.
params.tokenOwner: The address of the token owner initiating the airdrop.

NATIVE_TOKEN.details: The address of the native token (ETH).

devdoc.title: AirdropERC20

airdrop(address,address,(address,uint256.notice: Allows the user to distribute ERC20 tokens to a list of addresses.
